header.tagline: Track FACEIT players in real time and manage your matchmaking blocks with ease.
subtitle: Smart blocking for smarter matchmaking
landing.feature1_desc: Quickly find players on the FACEIT platform and add them to your personal watchlist.
landing.feature2_desc: Know when a player is currently in a match or finished one in the last few hours, with automatic updates.
landing.feature3_desc: With the WatchIT Extension installed, see which SuperMatches are happening and plan your queues better.
landing.feature4_desc: Share lists with your Duo or Stack to avoid duplicate blocks and improve team coordination.
about.title: About WatchIT
about.description: WatchIT is a tool created for CS2 players who use the FACEIT platform. It provides an easy way to track and plan your matches, allowing you to monitor player activity and SuperMatches in real time.
about.purpose_desc: WatchIT was born from the desire to make competitive gaming more strategic and fun. We want players to plan their matches better and avoid bad queues.
about.evolution_desc: WatchIT is a living project that depends directly on the support and feedback of its users. We are always listening to the community to build new features. Your support, whether through suggestions or donations, is what allows us to keep evolving.
subscriptions.header.title: Subscriptions
subscriptions.header.subtitle: Enjoy the early phase: Single plan with full access to WatchIT.
subscriptions.plan.one_time.title: 30-Day Access (One-Time)
subscriptions.plan.one_time.feature2: You decide when to renew (price may increase).
subscriptions.plan.subscription.title: Monthly Subscription
subscriptions.plan.subscription.feature2: Ideal for continuous and long-term use.

subscriptions.features.item1: 30 Monitoring Slots: Increase your ability to track more players
subscriptions.features.item2: SuperMatch View: Plan your next moves correctly
subscriptions.features.item4: Founder Benefit: Your R$ 11.90/month rate is locked forever, even if plan prices increase
subscriptions.payment.title: 2. Choose the Payment Method
subscriptions.button.label: Just enjoy WatchIT for now ;)
donate.title: Support WatchIT
donate.description: Many new features are on the way, but resources are limited. If you're enjoying the project and are curious to see how far we can go, consider supporting with a donation!
donate.qr_instructions: Scan the QR Code to donate via Pix.
donate.paypal_note: You'll be redirected to the PayPal page.
donate.footer: Every contribution matters. Thank you for supporting WatchIT! ðŸ’›
donate.donor_table_att: Supporters Table updates daily at 6 PM
donate.success_message: Your contribution helps WatchIT continue to grow and bring new features to the gaming community.

live_supermatches_page.install_extension: For premium WatchIT experience, install it by clicking in the button below

live_supermatches_page.hover_cards: To open matches on FACEIT, just hover over the Cards
profile_page.name: Name
instructions.title: How to Use WatchIT:
instructions.step1: 1. Search for a Player: Look up the player you want to add.
instructions.step2: 2. Select the Player: Click their card to add them to your WatchIT list.
instructions.step3: 3. Track Matches: If the player is in a match, it will appear here. You can now remove them from your matchmaking block list.
instructions.step4: 4. Visualize Recently Finished Games: If a player recently finished a game, they're probably in the queue. Keep an eye out.
instructions.step5: 5. Manage List: Remove players from your WatchIT list anytime.
labels.slider_label: Visualize games that finished in the last:
labels.empty_filtered_list: This player list is empty for now; try adjusting your filters!
labels.empty_ongoing_games: No one is playing right now!

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: WatchIT values your privacy. This page explains what data we collect, how we use it, and your rights.
privacy.data_collected.title: Data We Collect
privacy.data_collected.sso: When you log in using Faceit SSO, we collect the following personal information:
privacy.data_collected.sso.name: Full name
privacy.data_collected.usage: We also collect non-identifiable usage data to improve the extension, such as feature usage and errors.
privacy.how_we_use.title: How We Use Your Data
privacy.how_we_use.sso: Personal data collected via SSO is used to:
privacy.how_we_use.sso.list1: Create and manage your WatchIT account
privacy.how_we_use.sso.list3: Communicate with you about updates or support
privacy.how_we_use.usage: Non-identifiable usage data is used to improve functionality and fix bugs. Personal data is never sold or shared with third parties.
privacy.paid_features.title: Paid Features
privacy.paid_features.description1: WatchIT may offer premium features that require payment. All payment processing is handled by secure third-party providers, and WatchIT does not store credit card information.
privacy.paid_features.description2: We may retain information such as your account email and purchase history to manage your access to paid features and provide support.
privacy.data_security.title: Data Storage & Security
privacy.data_security.description: Personal data is stored securely in our database and protected using industry-standard security measures. We retain your data only as long as necessary for the purposes listed above.
privacy.your_rights.title: Your Rights
privacy.your_rights.description: You can request access, correction, or deletion of your personal data by contacting us at
privacy.policy_updates.title: Policy Updates
privacy.policy_updates.description: We may update this Privacy Policy occasionally. Users are encouraged to review this page for any updates.
footer.no_affiliation: This project is not affiliated with
